title: 30 stable ping all game to 74-80.
body:
So if your goal was to finally make me uninstall, you'r getting really close.

GFY your central servers, fragment the playerbase on two different servers. 

This rising tide isn't lifting all boats, it's making the west coast sink, and the east coast just sink LESS.

No one is fucking floating with this solution.

Pay for the two server farms you cheap bastards.
